 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצָה‎</span> **verb** ==be pleased with, accept favourably== (Late Hebrew ***id., will, be willing***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (originally <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***be well pleased with***, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG liv (1900), 155</sup>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצֿו‎</span> ***favour*** [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, no. 77, 9</sup> and others, compare [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Südar. Chrest. 123</sup>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצֿים‎</span> ***good, acceptable***, [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, no. 73, 9</sup>, and others, of a coin, ***good***, Id<sup>ib. no. 21, 5</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְעָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***have pleasure in***, compare II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעָה‎</span> above); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Eccl.9.7|Eccl 9:7]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצָם‎</span> [[Jer.14.10|Jer 14:10]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָצִאתִי‎</span> [[Ezek.43.27|Ezek 43:27]] consecutive (metaplastic [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75rr»§ 75rr</sup>; Aramaism, [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]; but [[BDB#Co|Co]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָצִיתִי‎</span>), etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְצֶה‎</span> [[Ps.147.10|Ps 147:10]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְצְךָ‎</span> [[Mal.1.8|Mal 1:8]] 3 feminine singular jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּ֫רֶץ‎</span> [[Lev.26.43|Lev 26:43]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְצֶנָה‎</span> [[Prov.23.6|Prov 23:6]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ( &lt; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּצֹּרְנָה‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצר‎</span>, compare Toy), etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְצֵה‎</span> [[Ps.40.14|Ps 40:14]]; [[Ps.119.108|Ps 119:108]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְצוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.16.7|Prov 16:7]]; [[Ps.77.8|Ps 77:8]], etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺצֶה‎</span> [[Ps.147.11|Ps 147:11]]; [[Ps.149.4|Ps 149:4]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹצָם‎</span> [[Jer.14.12|Jer 14:12]] passive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְצוּי‎</span> [[Esth.10.3|Esth 10:3]], construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְצוּי‎</span> [[Deut.33.24|Deut 33:24]] — 

**1.** ***be pleased with, favourable to:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of God, with accusative of person [[Isa.42.1|Isa 42:1]]; [[Ps.44.4|Ps 44:4]]; [[Ps.147.11|Ps 147:11]]; [[Job.33.26|Job 33:26]] with accusative of thing [[Ps.85.2|Ps 85:2]]; [[1Chr.29.17|1Chr 29:17]]; [[Prov.16.7|Prov 16:7]]; [[Eccl.9.7|Eccl 9:7]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person [[Ps.149.4|Ps 149:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of thing [[Ps.147.10|Ps 147:10]]; [[Hag.1.8|Hag 1:8]] absolute [[Hag.77.8|Hag 77:8]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of men: with accusative of person, subject father [[Mal.1.8|Mal 1:8]], \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אהב‎</span> [[Prov.3.12|Prov 3:12]] of brother [[Gen.33.10|Gen 33:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), monarch [[2Chr.10.7|2Chr 10:7]] with accusative of thing [[Ps.62.5|Ps 62:5]]; [[Ps.102.15|Ps 102:15]]; [[Job.14.6|Job 14:6]]; [[Prov.23.26|Prov 23:26]] (but see above); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of thing [[1Chr.29.3|1Chr 29:3]]; [[Ps.49.14|Ps 49:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> person [[Job.34.9|Job 34:9]]; [[Ps.50.18|Ps 50:18]] passive participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָצוּי‎</span> ***favoured, acceptable to*** [[Deut.33.24|Deut 33:24]] (poem), [[Esth.10.3|Esth 10:3]]. 

**2.** ***accept:*** of God, with accusative of person, sacrificing, [[2Sam.24.23|2Sam 24:23]]; [[Hos.8.13|Hos 8:13]]; [[Jer.14.10|Jer 14:10]]; [[Jer.14.12|Jer 14:12]]; [[Ezek.20.40|Ezek 20:40]]; [[Ezek.20.41|Ezek 20:41]]; [[Ezek.43.27|Ezek 43:27]] with accusative of sacrifice [[Deut.33.11|Deut 33:11]]; [[Mal.1.10|Mal 1:10]]; [[Mal.1.13|Mal 1:13]]; [[Ps.51.18|Ps 51:18]]; [[Ps.119.108|Ps 119:108]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְ‎</span> of sacrifice [[Mic.6.7|Mic 6:7]] absolute Ani [[Mic.5.22|Mic 5:22]]. 

**3.** ***be pleased:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***determined***, with infinitive [[Ps.40.14|Ps 40:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּ‎</span> person [[1Chr.28.4|1Chr 28:4]]. 

**4.** ***make acceptable, satisfy*** (by paying off debt), subject land, paying off its sabbaths ([[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others ***accept***, be satisfied with [in payment]) [[Lev.26.34|Lev 26:34]]; [[Lev.26.43|Lev 26:43]]; [[2Chr.36.21|2Chr 36:21]], with accusative of guilt incurred (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוֺן‎</span>) [[Lev.26.41|Lev 26:41]]; [[Lev.26.43|Lev 26:43]] ( &lt; point all these as **Hiph\`il**, so [[BDB#SS|SS]] [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְצָה‎</span> [[Lev.1.4|Lev 1:4]]; [[Isa.40.2|Isa 40:2]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרָצֶה‎</span> [[Lev.7.18|Lev 7:18]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** passive of **Qal 2**, ***be accepted***, of sacrifices, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, [[Lev.1.4|Lev 1:4]]; [[Lev.22.25|Lev 22:25]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of sacrifice [[Lev.22.23|Lev 22:23]]; [[Lev.22.27|Lev 22:27]] absolute [[Lev.7.18|Lev 7:18]]; [[Lev.19.7|Lev 19:7]]. 

**2.** passive of **Qal 4:** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְצָח עֲוֺנָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.40.2|Isa 40:2]] ***her punishment is accepted*** (as satisfactory). **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַצּוּ‎</span> [[Job.20.10|Job 20:10]], with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּלִּים‎</span> ***seek the favour of the poor*** (but [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#SS|SS]] [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]] from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רצץ‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִרְצָת‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75m»§ 75m</sup>) consecutive [[Lev.26.34|Lev 26:34]] ***the land shall pay off her sabbaths*** (accusative), compare **Qal 4. Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְרַצֵּה‎</span> [[1Sam.29.4|1Sam 29:4]] with what ***shall he make himself acceptable unto*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) his lord? + 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְרַצּוּ‎</span> [[Hos.4.10|Hos 4:10]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יפרצּו‎</span>) ***they shall not have delight.***
